title: Scientist Dark Skin Tone
description: Represents a person working in science with a dark skin tone, often engaged in research, experiments, or discovery. It can symbolize intellect, innovation, and dedication to scientific pursuits.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the scientist emoji, depicted with a dark skin tone, embodies a spirit of intellectual curiosity with a thoughtful, focused expression.  The design features a crisp lab coat and subtle, realistic lighting that emphasizes the smooth, rounded forms characteristic of Apple's emoji style.  This rendering, with its dignified posture and approachable demeanor, symbolizes innovation, discovery, and dedication to scientific pursuits, frequently appearing in discussions about research, learning, or breakthroughs.
